data.title: Church Mouse In The Church House Lyrics by Ben Gibbard
data.meta_description: Church Mouse in the Church House Lyrics, Ben Gibbard, Does he know? No, no (4x)  You can be a little
data.text:
Clean Lyric

Paragraph Lyric

Does he know? No, no (4x)

You can be a little church mouse

In a box at the church house

If you never make a sound, now

And he never finds out, now

But you couldn't keep a little church mouse

Not with all the money in your purse, now

Not for all the liquor in the church house

Or the pussy keeping watch now

Does he know? No, no (4x)

Does he know he could'a' saved me? (2x)

How can he know and not be crazy? (2x)

Does he know? No, no (4x) You can be a little church mouse In a box at the church house If you never make a sound, now And he never finds out, now But you couldn't keep a little church mouse Not with all the money in your purse, now Not for all the liquor in the church house Or the pussy keeping watch now Does he know? No, no (4x) Does he know he could'a' saved me? (2x) How can he know and not be crazy? (2x)
